title: 24d01  “Off-highway” transportation.
text:
Drivers engaged in transportation solely
on private property do not come within the Sec 13(b)(1) exemption since such
transportation is not “over the public highways.” The fact that a State line or
a public highway is crossed during the course of such transportation would not
change this conclusion.
html: Drivers engaged in transportation solely on private property do not come within the Sec 13(b)(1) exemption since such transportation is not “over the public highways.” The fact that a State line or a public highway is crossed during the course of such transportation would not change this conclusion.
